T02D3761:115a-0: @115a * // mandal bya ba'i cho ga / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3761:115a-1: dang po dkyil 'khor che chung gi / bskus pas yog pa'i mar bshams la //
T02D3761:115a-2: lci ba dngos po nyi shur 'gyur //
T02D3761:115a-3: chu yang srang gi nyi shur 'gyur //
T02D3761:115a-4: 'o ma dag dang zho dag kyang ;
T02D3761:115a-5: / dang po mar gyi sum 'gyur ro //
T02D3761:115a-6: dang por lci ba btsir ba yang //
T02D3761:115a-7: ba yi chu yis mnos la btsir //
T02D3761:115a-8: de nas tshags kyis btsags bya ste //
T02D3761:115a-9: de nas de rnams sbyar byas la //
T02D3761:115a-10: zhag ni gnyis dang gsum bar du //
T02D3761:115a-11: de ni ras su bcug pa yang //
T02D3761:115a-12: nyi ma gnyis gnyis bar chod par//
T02D3761:115a-13: nyi ma bdun du rim gyis byug / de nas
T02D3761:115a-14: lag snum dag gis byug / de ni mi brtan
T02D3761:115a-15: par yang bshad // brtan par bya ba'i cho ga ni //
T02D3761:115a-16: mandal zur ni rams kyis byug / mdangs ni byung na legs par bshad //
T02D3761:115a-17: de nas sardza ra rdza dang //
T02D3761:115a-18: mar gyi lde gu byas pa yis //
T02D3761:115a-19: dkyil 'khor la ni bskus byas na //
T02D3761:115a-20: me long dang ni chu shel ltar //
T02D3761:115a-21: bzhin la sogs pa snang bar 'gyur //
T02D3761:115a-22: mandal bya ba'i cho ga dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob
T02D3761:115a-23: dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa
T02D3761:115a-25: / mandal bya ba'i cho ga 'di ni pha rol
